welcome: Hi there! I'm Sebastian. Welcome to my portfolio page.
aboutmep1: For over 2 years, I have been learning programming. My main interests revolve around MERN technologies (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js), which I actively work with in my daily job. During this time, I have gained a solid foundation in these technologies and continuously expand my knowledge.
aboutmep2: My main goal is continuous development of my knowledge and programming skills. I plan to further specialize in the MERN stack and explore new technologies that will enable me to create innovative solutions. Additionally, I would like to actively engage in the programming community, share knowledge, and collaborate with other technology enthusiasts.
helloHome: As a full-stack developer with a passion for creating innovative web applications, I use MERN technologies (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) to deliver high-quality and responsive websites.
contentHome: Welcome to Sebastian Nowak portfolio page featuring a collection of my web development and graphic design projects. Explore my skills in creating captivating websites, stunning graphics, and more.
